column3: By reconditioning the Resistance weapon, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.

Reapplication of aetheroinsulation coating requires <Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value> phials of aetherial sealant.
House of Splendors representatives are standing by, and ready to take your order!
Aetherial sealant can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.
By supplying the Allagan node with aetherial sealant, you may raise the four available attributes of your Resistance weapon as you see fit.

When you are satisfied with the allotment of attributes, select <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Allocate<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to complete the process.
Choose carefully, as redistribution of attributes will require the procurement of additional sealant.
<blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Insufficient aetherial sealant.
<blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Incompatible weapon detected. Please verify the correct weapon is equipped before placing next request.
You may only recondition your currently equipped Resistance weapon when accessing the Allagan node.
Recondition your presently equipped Resistance weapon?
<blip> Suspending weapon recondition protocol. Entering standby mode...

<blip> Scanning registry... Readying memories for extraction...
<blip> <blip> Reapplying aetheroinsulation coating...
Reconditioning protocol complete.
The Resistance weapon has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
